뉴스제목: Gacha Life: A Creative World of Character Design and Storytelling
본문: Gacha Life , developed by Lunime, has captured the hearts of millions of players worldwide. This free-to-play game allows users to create unique characters, craft engaging stories, and interact with others in a vibrant, imaginative universe. Whether you’re a fan of character design, storytelling, or mini-games, Gacha Life offers endless possibilities for creativity and fun. What is Gacha Life? Gacha Life is a popular casual game that combines character customization , scene creation , and mini-games . It’s a sandbox experience where players can design their characters, build intricate storylines, and bring their ideas to life. Key Features : Character Creation : Customize your avatar’s appearance, outfits, and accessories. Studio Mode : Create scenes with your characters and add dialogue for storytelling. Life Mode : Explore different locations and interact with NPCs for immersive roleplay. Mini-Games : Play fun games to earn rewards and improve your skills. Gacha System : Collect new items and accessories through the game’s gacha mechanic. How to Download and Play Gacha Life Gacha Life is available on multiple platforms, making it accessible to players everywhere. Step-by-Step Guide : Download the Game : Android : Available on Google Play Store. iOS : Download from the App Store. PC : Access the game via Lunime’s official website. Install and Launch : Open the app and follow the setup instructions. Start Creating : Dive into character customization and explore the game’s features. Character Customization in Gacha Life One of the game’s standout features is its extensive character customization options. Customization Options : Appearance : Choose hairstyles, eye shapes, skin tones, and facial expressions. Clothing : Mix and match outfits to create unique looks. Accessories : Add hats, glasses, wings, and more for extra flair. Pose and Movement : Set your character’s pose and adjust their body position for dynamic scenes. With these tools, players can design avatars that reflect their personality or tell specific stories. Studio Mode: Bringing Stories to Life Studio Mode is where Gacha Life truly shines, allowing players to create custom scenes and narratives. How to Use Studio Mode : Add Characters : Choose characters from your collection and place them in the scene. Set Backgrounds : Select from various backgrounds to suit your story. Add Dialogue : Create speech bubbles to give your characters a voice. Adjust Poses : Change character poses to enhance the scene’s dynamics. This mode is perfect for crafting short stories , comic strips , or even mini-movies to share with the Gacha Life community. Life Mode: Explore and Interact In Life Mode, players can step into their characters’ shoes and interact with NPCs (non-playable characters) in different settings. Key Locations : School : Roleplay as a student and meet new characters. Town : Explore shops, parks, and other areas. Home : Relax and customize your character’s living space. Life Mode adds a roleplaying element to Gacha Life, making it more immersive and engaging. Mini-Games: Earn Rewards and Have Fun Gacha Life features a variety of mini-games that not only provide entertainment but also reward players with in-game currency and items. Popular Mini-Games : Phantom’s Remix : A rhythm-based game to test your musical skills. Bex’s Festival : Help Bex collect as many items as possible within a time limit. 1Chi’s Math : Solve math problems quickly to earn points. These games are a fun break from character creation and storytelling while helping you earn resources. The Gacha Mechanic: Collect and Customize The game’s namesake, the gacha system , lets players collect new items, accessories, and characters through randomized draws. How It Works : Use in-game currency (earned or purchased) to spin the gacha wheel. Receive random rewards, including rare items and upgrades. Customize your characters with the newly acquired assets. The gacha mechanic adds an element of surprise and excitement, keeping players engaged. Safety Tips for Gacha Life Players While Gacha Life is family-friendly, here are some tips to ensure a safe and enjoyable experience: 1. Monitor Online Interactions If playing the online version, be mindful of conversations with other players. Avoid sharing personal information. 2. Use Parental Controls Parents can enable restrictions to limit in-app purchases or access to certain features. 3. Stay Within the App Encourage players to enjoy Gacha Life within the app to avoid unofficial or modded versions, which may pose security risks. Why is Gacha Life So Popular? Gacha Life’s popularity stems from its creative freedom and strong community. Players of all ages can express themselves through character design, storytelling, and roleplay, making it a versatile and engaging platform. Key Reasons for Its Success : Accessible Gameplay : Intuitive controls and diverse features appeal to a wide audience. Community-Driven Content : Fans share their creations on platforms like YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram. Endless Possibilities : The combination of customization, storytelling, and interaction ensures replayability. Gacha Life Alternatives If you enjoy Gacha Life, consider exploring similar games: 1. Gacha Club An upgraded version of Gacha Life with enhanced customization options and new gameplay features. 2. Zepeto A social avatar app with robust customization and interactive features. 3. BitLife A life simulation game offering unique scenarios and storytelling opportunities. Conclusion Gacha Life is a creative playground that empowers players to design characters, craft stories, and immerse themselves in a vibrant virtual world. Whether you’re customizing avatars, playing mini-games, or building intricate scenes, the possibilities are endless. With its welcoming community and expansive features, Gacha Life continues to be a top choice for gamers of all ages. Download Gacha Life today and start your creative journey! This consolidation phase began after XRP hit its all-time high of $3.84 in January 2018, and many prominent analysts have pointed to similar extended consolidation phases . The current price movements suggest that breaking out of this established range could signal a significant breakthrough for the cryptocurrency. Amonyx expects the surge following this extended consolidation to shock the market. He stated on X, “Love it or hate it, the #XRP explosion will begin unexpectedly.” Although Amonyx did not provide a specific target, his chart suggests that the digital asset could reach double digits. 뉴스제목: The future of B2B cross-border transactions is on the blockchain | Opinion
본문: Disclosure: The views and opinions expressed here belong solely to the author and do not represent the views and opinions of crypto.news’ editorial. The world we operate in is rapidly changing, and businesses are having to adapt swiftly. Following the global pandemic, many enterprise businesses were forced to look domestically as supply chains were hit and international trade became more challenging. This has been compounded by geo-political tensions, which have been impacting global supply chains. However, many supply chains have started to open up and are becoming increasingly strong as new technology unlocks borders, both physically and metaphorically. You might also like: Collaborative infrastructure is the only way for DeFi-TradFi cooperation | Opinion Despite this, one consistent ‘thorn in the side’ issue for finance teams is that of cross-border payments. Moving any amount of money safely and quickly to different parts of the world without being hit with excessive fees is a challenge that’s been well-documented from a consumer perspective. The issues are compounded when the size and complexity of the transaction multiplies for enterprises. However, there is a solution here. Digital currencies powered by blockchain technology are poised to revolutionize B2B interactions on a global scale and have the ability to remove those cross-border payment problems for businesses. They will offer the ability to pay 24/7, 365 days, all around the world in a secure manner with low fees. At the start of October, the online payment giant PayPal used SAP’s new Digital Currency Hub to pay an invoice to Ernst & Young using its stablecoin PayPal USD ( PYUSD ). Examples like this show the increasing adoption of digital currencies and blockchain technology by global firms, with cross-border payments being a tangible use case. The challenges for enterprise businesses Legacy infrastructure supporting cross-border transactions can be cumbersome, expensive and full of compliance challenges. Enterprises of all sizes feel this pressure acutely, and digital currencies can solve many of the problems that these enterprises face. When I speak to our clients, it’s clear how digital currency payments can help them. The big three challenges most frequently referenced are: Speed and accessibility: Traditional payments can take place only during banking hours, and customers need to be mindful of closing times. Also, they take up to several days to settle—especially when complex in nature or of a high value. In contrast, transactions made with digital currencies can be executed almost instantaneously. This speed is particularly important for large enterprises needing to move high amounts of money cross-border on a weekend, for example, to complete an M&A transaction. Cost efficiency: Enterprises often face high transaction fees and unfavorable exchange rates when engaging in international trade. These costs can accumulate quickly, impacting profitability. Digital currencies can significantly reduce transaction fees, as they eliminate the need for multiple intermediaries. Regulatory compliance: Globally, we’re seeing increasingly complex regulatory environments. Navigating multiple different geographies compounds this issue. Digital currencies can enhance transparency and traceability, making it easier for enterprises to comply with local and international regulations. Blockchain’s immutable ledger provides a reliable audit trail, facilitating compliance and reducing the risk of fraud. Efficiencies and savings for enterprise businesses If the three challenges listed above are solved through blockchain technology and digital currencies, enterprise businesses can streamline operations significantly—with clear cost savings. But the benefits go so much broader too: Improved cash flow management: Faster transactions lead to better cash flow management. Enterprises can receive payments in real time, enhancing liquidity and allowing for more strategic investments and operational flexibility. Ability to establish new business models: With significantly lower costs, especially for smaller payments, enterprises can establish new consumption or subscription-based business models involving more frequent invoicing with lower payment amounts, thus allowing them to differentiate their offerings. Reduced fraud risk: Fraud and cybercrime are significant risks in cross-border transactions. Blockchain’s decentralized nature ensures that no single entity has control over the entire system. Each transaction is recorded on a public ledger and cannot be reverted, so fraudulent chargebacks are impossible. Looking to the future—how do we get there? The points I’ve listed above provide only a snapshot of why I believe we’ll start seeing more and more enterprise B2B payments take place on the blockchain with stablecoins. The savings, operational efficiency, and security benefits combined are too much to ignore. However, there’s still a long way to go before blockchain-enabled enterprise stablecoin payments become the norm. To realize the full potential of blockchain in B2B cross-border transactions, enterprises must take deliberate steps to integrate this technology into their operations. The first step towards this future is for leaders to educate their teams about the benefits and functionalities of blockchain technology and digital currencies, particularly stablecoins. This understanding will facilitate smoother transitions and greater buy-in internally. Before full-scale implementation, enterprises should conduct pilot projects to test payments with stablecoins in controlled environments. This approach allows organizations to identify challenges and gauge the technology’s effectiveness for their particular use cases. Partnering with crypto custody providers and exchanges, as well as business application providers, can help businesses navigate any integration issues and provide valuable expertise and resources. I believe the future of B2B cross-border enterprise transactions is undeniably intertwined with blockchain technology. As we move forward, the call to action is clear: enterprises should consider evolving their financial strategies and utilizing the power of the blockchain and stablecoins for payments. The benefits are significant. Read more: Digital asset investors embrace a bullish optimism | Opinion Author: Cedric Bru Cedric Bru is the CEO of Taulia. In this role, Cedric drives worldwide growth, increasing market penetration and identifying new business opportunities. Since joining Taulia in 2013, Cedric, who previously served as the company’s Chief Sales Officer, has helped Taulia triple its revenue for two consecutive years, built strategic international partnerships, and helped guide the company to a 100 percent customer retention rate. Before Taulia, Cedric served as Global Head of Sales, Marketing, and Business Development at Syncada from Visa. Cedric has over two decades of experience in the financial services and software industries, including positions at Visa and Hewlett-Packard.

뉴스제목: Gacha Club: The Ultimate Game for Character Customization and Creativity
본문: Gacha Club , developed by Lunime, is the highly anticipated follow-up to the fan-favorite Gacha Life . Packed with advanced customization options, engaging mini-games, and a battle mode, Gacha Club takes creativity and entertainment to the next level. Whether you’re designing characters, creating stories, or battling with your customized team, Gacha Club offers something for every player. What is Gacha Club? Gacha Club is a free-to-play game that combines character creation, storytelling, and combat mechanics. Building on the success of Gacha Life, Gacha Club introduces new features, including a battle system , expanded customization , and studio mode for creating dynamic scenes. Key Features : Character Customization : Create and style up to 100 characters. Studio Mode : Design scenes and stories using custom characters and dialogue. Battle Mode : Form a team and fight monsters in RPG-style combat. Mini-Games : Play for rewards like gems and coins. Gacha System : Collect items, pets, and characters. How to Download and Play Gacha Club Gacha Club is available across multiple platforms for easy access. Download Guide : Android : Download from the Google Play Store. iOS : Available on the App Store. PC : Play on Windows via Lunime’s official website. Once downloaded, launch the app, and you’re ready to start your creative journey. Character Customization in Gacha Club Gacha Club offers an expansive set of tools for creating unique characters. Customization Options : Appearance : Choose from countless hairstyles, facial features, and body types. Clothing : Mix and match outfits, accessories, and colors. Weapons and Pets : Add props and companions to enhance your characters. Layers and Positions : Fine-tune character poses and layering for detailed designs. With the ability to save up to 100 characters , the possibilities are endless. Studio Mode: Bring Your Stories to Life In Studio Mode , players can create dynamic scenes and craft stories using their customized characters. Features of Studio Mode : Scene Creation : Place characters, props, and pets in a variety of backgrounds. Dialogue and Expression : Add speech bubbles and adjust expressions to enhance storytelling. Custom Poses : Use advanced positioning tools to create dynamic visuals. Studio Mode is perfect for creating comic strips, short animations, or simply experimenting with creative ideas. Battle Mode: A Unique Addition Unlike its predecessor, Gacha Club introduces a Battle Mode , blending RPG mechanics with the game’s creative core. How It Works : Team Formation : Assemble a team of up to four characters. Combat : Fight monsters in turn-based battles using skills and attacks. Leveling Up : Earn experience to strengthen your team. Elements and Strategy : Choose characters with complementary elemental affinities for maximum impact. This mode adds an exciting layer of gameplay, catering to fans of action and strategy. Mini-Games and Rewards Gacha Club features several mini-games that offer fun diversions and rewards: Popular Mini-Games : Lemo and Yuni Dance : A rhythm-based game to test your timing. Usagi vs. Neko : A fast-paced action game. Memory Match : Improve your memory while earning rewards. Mini-games reward players with gems, coins, and exclusive items for further customization. The Gacha System: Collect to Enhance The gacha mechanic is at the heart of Gacha Club, allowing players to unlock items, characters, and pets. How It Works : Spend gems or coins to draw from the gacha system. Collect rare and unique items to enhance your characters or improve your team in Battle Mode. The gacha mechanic adds a layer of excitement and keeps players engaged. Differences Between Gacha Life and Gacha Club Gacha Club builds on the foundation of Gacha Life while introducing new features: Feature Gacha Life Gacha Club Character Slots Up to 20 Up to 100 Battle Mode Not Available Available Studio Features Basic Advanced Mini-Games Limited Expanded Gacha System Simplistic More Comprehensive Fans of Gacha Life will find Gacha Club to be a natural and exciting upgrade. Community and Creative Sharing The Gacha community is a vibrant hub of creativity, with players sharing their designs, stories, and animations on platforms like YouTube , TikTok , and Instagram . Popular Trends : Gacha Edits : Fans create and share edited versions of their characters. Mini Movies : Short films using Studio Mode. Tutorials : Guides on advanced customization and scene creation. Joining the Gacha Club community is a great way to connect with other creators and find inspiration. Tips for Getting Started Experiment Freely : Don’t be afraid to try different customization options and storytelling techniques. Focus on Balance : In Battle Mode, create a team with complementary elements. Save Resources : Use gems and coins wisely to unlock rare items. Join the Community : Engage with other players to learn and share ideas. Is Gacha Club Safe for Kids? Gacha Club is family-friendly, but parents should supervise online interactions if children engage with the community. Lunime ensures that the game itself does not contain inappropriate content, but external sharing platforms may vary. Parental Tips : Enable device restrictions to manage in-app purchases. Encourage gameplay within the app to avoid third-party modifications. Conclusion Gacha Club is a must-play for fans of creativity and customization. With its advanced features, including Battle Mode, Studio Mode, and an expansive gacha system, the game offers endless possibilities for fun and self-expression. Whether you’re a returning Gacha Life player or new to the Gacha universe, Gacha Club is the ultimate playground for your imagination. Download Gacha Club today and start creating, battling, and sharing! 뉴스제목: Crypto Daybook Americas: Banks Favor King Dollar as BTC Tug-of-War Rages
본문: By Omkar Godbole (All times ET unless indicated otherwise)  Bitcoin's bull-bear tug-of-war continues to rage, with prices recovering to over $97,000 from Monday's dip to $94,200. The slide was prompted by concern Google's new quantum-computing chip, Willow, could compromise BTC's security — a worry quickly dismissed by analysts.  That leaves directional traders with little to do other than wait for the dust to settle before picking a side, as prices remain locked in Thursday's indecisive trading range.   But there’s a silver lining! The turbulence has crowded out those undisciplined, overleveraged altcoin traders, as is evident from perpetual funding rates. Altcoin rates have receded closer to the center of Velo Data's heat map, which oscillates between -200% and 200%, indicating more balanced conditions than the bullish extremes of last week. Tokens like Stacks' STX even sport negative funding rates, a perfect entry point for bulls, according to pseudonymous analyst Byzantine General.  "If these rates continue to decline, it could signal the unwinding of excessive long leverage, potentially leading to a more balanced market," analysts at Bitfinex said, adding that $100,000 is no longer the key support/resistance level and a new equilibrium is probably forming in spot markets.  That said, as we look toward the end of 2024, there’s a developing story: Banks are getting bullish on the dollar, which doesn’t usually bode well for assets denominated in the U.S. currency, like BTC and risk assets.  "The combination of cyclical, fiscal, and U.S. political forces is making the USD stronger again," HSBC said recently. "We update our USD bullish view further; the USD bubble is re-inflating, which spells trouble ahead for many other currencies." Citibank sees the dollar index (DXY) rallying to 115, an 8% increase.  Keep an eye on the Far East too. A renewed rally in Chinese stocks following Beijing's promise of more stimulus could suck capital from other markets, including cryptocurrencies.  Amid all this, there's talk President-elect Trump may struggle to deliver his crypto promises. Peter Tschir, head of macro strategy at Academy Securities, put it best: "Trump does have loyalty to those who helped fund his campaign, but I don't see this as a lasting relationship, especially as he will likely get a lot of pressure from the National Security element of D.C. to be cautious on helping crypto too much."  After all, it's one thing to promise big from Mar-a-Lago and a different ball game when delivering from the White House. Stay Alert!  What to Watch  Crypto:  Dec. 10, 11:30 a.m.: Microsoft's annual shareholders meeting. The meeting will include MicroStrategy Executive Chairman Michael Saylor's 44-slide presentation on investing in Bitcoin. Microsoft will then disclose the voting results. Livestream link.  Dec. 13: The annual Nasdaq-100 reconstitution. Changes to the index, if any, are announced on this day. MicroStrategy (MSTR), the world’s largest corporate holder of bitcoin, is widely expected to be added to the index.  Dec. 18: CleanSpark (CLSK) Q4 FY 2024 earnings. EPS Est. $-0.18 vs Prev. $-1.02.  Macro  Dec. 11, 8:30 a.m.: The U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) releases November’s Consumer Price Index (CPI) data.  Inflation Rate YoY Est. 2.7% vs Prev. 2.6%  Core Inflation Rate YoY Est. 3.3% vs Prev. 3.3%  Dec. 11, 9:45 a.m.: The Bank of Canada announces its policy interest rate (also known as overnight target rate and overnight lending rate). Est. 3.25% vs Prev. 3.75%. A press conference starts at 10:30 a.m. Livestream link  Dec. 12, 8:15 a.m.: The European Central Bank (ECB) announces its latest monetary policy decision (three key interest rates) followed by a press conference at 8:45 am.  Deposit facility interest rate Est. 3.0% vs Prev. 3.25%.  Main refinancing operations interest rate Est. 3.15% vs Prev. 3.4%.  Marginal lending facility interest rate Prev. 3.65%.  Token Events  Governance votes & calls  Horizen to hold community call discussing ZEN halving and future plans at 8 a.m.  Token Launches  Movement's MOVE has added 63% since going live on Monday, reaching a $2.5 billion market capitalization.  Binance listed SPX, VIRTUAL, RAY and KOMA on futures.  Hacks  The Clober Liquidity Vault has been hacked, resulting in a loss of 133 $ETH (worth ~$500K). The exploiter has already bridged the stolen funds from Base to Ethereum.  Conferences:  Dec. 9 - 10: Bitcoin MENA 2024 (Abu Dhabi, UAE)  Dec. 9 - 12: Abu Dhabi Finance Week 2024 (Abu Dhabi, UAE)  Dec. 9 - 13: Luxembourg Blockchain Week 2024  Dec. 12 - 13: Global Blockchain Show (Dubai, UAE)  Dec. 12 - 14: Taipei Blockchain Week 2024 (Taipei, Taiwan)  Dec. 13: Limitless Crypto 2024 (San Juan, Puerto Rico)  Dec. 16 - 17: Blockchain Association’s Policy Summit (Washington)  Jan. 13 - 24: Swiss WEB3FEST Winter Edition 2025 (Zug, Zurich, St. Moritz, Davos)  Jan. 17: Unchained: Blockchain Business Forum 2025 (Los Angeles)  Jan. 18: BitcoinDay (Napes, Florida)  Jan. 21: Frankfurt Tokenization Conference 2025  Token Talk  By Shaurya Malwa  Everything with "quantum" in the name is pumping!  Various tokens themed after, or claiming to use, quantum computing within their technology stack jumped more than 100% in the past 24 hours after internet giant Google unveiled Willow, a quantum-computing chip that took 5 minutes to solve tasks during its testing period that would have taken 10 septillion years for current supercomputers to finish.  Crypto markets took a hit after the announcement on concerns the development was long-term bearish for bitcoin and other blockchains, whose security features can, in theory, be exploited by quantum computers.  But while the entire market dropped, tokens such as Quantum Resistant Ledger (QRL), Quantum Network, Quantum Swap, among others, zoomed higher.  Quantum-resistant or post-quantum tokens aim to use cryptographic algorithms believed to be secure against quantum computing attacks. These algorithms are designed to resist attacks using Shor’s algorithm, which is particularly effective against current public-key cryptosystems.  Tokens labeled with "quantum" might be perceived as being at the forefront of technology, even if their actual utility or relation to quantum computing is minimal. This perception can drive investment — and a chance to speculate on the short-term trading narrative.  Derivatives Positioning  Perpetual funding rates in DINO coins have normalized as Monday's price drop triggered a decent leverage washout.   ETH's implied volatility term structure remains in backwardation, pointing to higher near-term volatility.   A notable BTC options trade included a long position in the $150,000 strike call expiring in March. Meanwhile, someone sold the ETH $5,000 call expiring at the end of March in large numbers, collecting nearly $1.8 million in premium.   Short-term BTC and ETH calls are now trading at less than 2 vol premium to puts, a sign of weakening bull bias. (Source: Amberdata, Deribit, Velo Data)  Market Movements:  BTC is up 0.76 % from 4 p.m. ET Monday to $97,763.77 (24hrs: -0.3%)  ETH is up 1.66% at $3,765.44 (24hrs: -2.23%)  CoinDesk 20 is up 1.78% to 3,954.73 (24hrs: -4.54%)  Ether staking yield is up 15 bps to 3.2%  BTC funding rate is at 0.01% (10.95% annualized) on Binance  DXY is up 0.23% at 106.39  Gold is up 1.24% at $2,697.9/oz  Silver is up 0.9% to $32.51/oz  Nikkei 225 is up 0.53% unchanged at 39,367.58  Hang Seng is down 0.5% at 20,311.28  FTSE is down 0.63% at 8,299.38  Euro Stoxx 50 is down 0.45% at 4962.94  DJIA closed on Monday -0.54% to 44,401.93  S&P 500 closed -0.61% at 6,052.85  Nasdaq closed -0.62% at 19,736.69  S&P/TSX Composite Index closed -0.26% at 25,625.40  S&P 40 Latin America closed +1.15% at 2,356.64  U.S. 10-year Treasury was unchanged at 4.23%  E-mini S&P 500 futures are unchanged at 6,064.50  E-mini Nasdaq-100 futures are unchanged at 21,488.00  E-mini Dow Jones Industrial Average Index futures are unchanged at 44,455.00  Bitcoin Stats:  BTC Dominance: 56.82% (-0.22%)  Ethereum to bitcoin ratio: 0.03845 (0.76%)  Hashrate (seven-day moving average): 773 EH/s  Hashprice (spot): $61.93  Total Fees: 15.97 BTC / $9.46M   CME Futures Open Interest: 196K BTC  BTC priced in gold: 36.7 oz  BTC vs gold market cap: 10.46%  Bitcoin sitting in over-the-counter desk balances: 432K BTC  Basket Performance  Technical Analysis  The chart shows the price of the Nasdaq-listed ProShares UltraShort Bitcoin ETF (SBIT) and its 14-day RSI, a momentum oscillator.   The RSI has diverged bullishly, contradicting the lower lows in prices in a sign of waning downward momentum. In other words, the ETF could see some gains in the short-term.   Crypto Equities  MicroStrategy (MSTR): closed on Monday at $365.34 (-7.51%), up 2.72% at $375.49 in pre-market.  Coinbase Global (COIN): closed at $310.52 (-9.63%), up 2.62% at $318.67 in pre-market.  Galaxy Digital Holdings (GLXY): closed at C$26.72 (-10.64%)  MARA Holdings (MARA): closed at $23.86 (-9.72%), up 1.82% at $24.29 in pre-market.  Riot Platforms (RIOT): closed at $11.21 (-13.44%), up 1.52% at $11.38 in pre-market.  Core Scientific (CORZ): closed at $16.04 (-5.59%), up 0.31% at $16.09  in pre-market.  CleanSpark (CLSK): closed at $13.56 (-9.42%), up 3.61% at 14.05.  CoinShares Valkyrie Bitcoin Miners ETF (WGMI): closed at $28.58 (-7.63%).  Semler Scientific (SMLR): closed at $62.12 (+0.6%).  ETF Flows  Spot BTC ETFs:  Daily net inflow: $479.1 million  Cumulative net inflows: $33.88 billion  Total BTC holdings ~ 1.108 million.  Spot ETH ETFs  Daily net inflow: $149.8 million  Cumulative net inflows: $1.56 billion  Total ETH holdings ~ 3.287 million.  Source: Farside Investors  Overnight Flows  Chart of the Day  The rally in Nvidia (NVDA), which has traditionally shown a positive correlation with bitcoin, appears to have lost momentum.  While You Were Sleeping  XRP, Dogecoin Dive 12% as Altcoin Carnage Leads to Highest Bullish Liquidation in Nearly 3 Years (CoinDesk): Major altcoins plummeted during early Asian hours Tuesday, with XRP, DOGE, and ADA dropping up to 15%, while Bitcoin fell 3%. Analysts pointed to an overheated market, Google's quantum chip announcement, and unusual sell orders, with forced liquidations of over $1.5 billion exacerbating the downturn.   Russian State Duma Deputy Proposes Strategic Bitcoin Reserve (Bitcoin Magazine): On Monday, Russia's State Duma Deputy Anton Tkachev proposed to Finance Minister Anton Siluanov the creation of a strategic bitcoin reserve to bolster the country's financial stability, citing vulnerabilities of traditional currency reserves to inflation and sanctions. Tkachev highlighted cryptocurrencies' growing role in international trade amid sanctions, as Russia plans to experiment with cross-border crypto settlements.   What Does Google's Quantum Computing Chip Mean for Bitcoin? (CoinDesk): Willow quantum chip marks a breakthrough, performing tasks in minutes that classical supercomputers would take ten septillion years to complete. While the 105-qubit chip highlights quantum computing’s potential, it remains far from the scale needed to compromise Bitcoin’s encryption. Crypto researchers, including Ethereum’s Vitalik Buterin, emphasize the urgency of developing quantum-resistant algorithms.   Oil Prices Ease, but Geopolitical Risk and China Policy Stance Check Losses (CNBC): Oil prices eased slightly on Tuesday but retained earlier gains, driven by geopolitical risks after Syrian President Bashar al-Assad’s fall and optimism around China’s plans for economic stimulus. Traders also await U.S. supply data, with initial signals pointing to declining crude and gasoline stockpiles that could further shape price trends.   India Rupee Hits Record Low, Bond Yields Dip as Change of Guard at RBI Spurs Rate Cut Bets (Reuters): The Indian rupee slid to a record low of 84.85 per U.S. dollar, while 10-year government bond yields declined. Traders expect a February rate cut under new Reserve Bank of India Governor Sanjay Malhotra, whose stance is seen as more dovish than his predecessor and who starts his three-year term on Wednesday.   ECB Officials to Lock Horns Over How Much Cuts Can Boost Economy (Bloomberg): European Central Bank officials agree on the need for lower rates to support the EU's struggling economy but hold differing views on their effectiveness. Structural issues like high energy costs and geopolitical risks, such as the prospect of increased US tariffs on EU exports, may hinder efforts to stimulate spending and investment.   RBA Hold Rates Steady But Sounds More Confident That Inflation Is Being Tamed (The Wall Street Journal): The Reserve Bank of Australia held its cash rate at 4.35% on Tuesday, signaling a more dovish stance by noting easing inflation risks and narrowing demand-supply imbalances. Business conditions appear to be at their weakest level since mid-2020, even as the RBA highlights a tight labor market and persistent core inflation pressures.  In the Ether

뉴스제목: How to Play Roblox Online: A Guide to Seamless Browser-Based Gaming
본문: Roblox , a global phenomenon with millions of active users, lets players create, share, and explore virtual worlds. While traditionally played via apps or downloads, advancements in technology now allow you to play Roblox online through a browser, eliminating the need for installations. Here’s everything you need to know about playing Roblox online, including browser-based platforms and tips for optimizing your experience. Can You Play Roblox Online Without Downloading? Yes, you can play Roblox online through platforms like Now.gg , a cloud-based gaming service that enables instant access via a web browser. This option is perfect for users who want to bypass downloads and still enjoy the full Roblox experience. How to Play Roblox Online Option 1: Using Now.gg Now.gg provides a seamless way to play Roblox directly in your browser. Steps to Play Roblox Online via Now.gg : Visit Now.gg : Open your browser and navigate to Now.gg Roblox . Search for Roblox : Use the search feature to locate Roblox in the game library. Click Play : Select Roblox and hit the Play in Browser button. Log in to Your Account : Enter your Roblox credentials to access your profile, games, and friends. Start Playing : Enjoy Roblox instantly without the need for downloads or installations. Option 2: Roblox Web App Roblox’s official website also allows players to access games directly through their accounts. Steps to Play on Roblox Web App : Visit Roblox.com : Go to the official website. Log In : Enter your username and password to access your account. Select a Game : Browse through the catalog and choose a game to play. Launch the Game : Click Play to start. Note that some games may require the installation of Roblox Player. Benefits of Playing Roblox Online Playing Roblox online offers several advantages: 1. No Downloads Required Eliminate the need for downloading large files or software updates. 2. Access on Any Device Play on PCs, Chromebooks, or even mobile devices without worrying about hardware limitations. 3. Quick and Easy Access Jump straight into your favorite games without waiting for installations. Optimizing Your Online Roblox Experience To ensure smooth gameplay while playing Roblox online, follow these tips: 1. Use a Stable Internet Connection A high-speed, reliable internet connection is essential for lag-free gaming. 2. Close Background Apps Minimize background applications to maximize browser performance. 3. Update Your Browser Ensure your browser is up-to-date to avoid compatibility issues. 4. Enable Hardware Acceleration For enhanced performance, enable hardware acceleration in your browser settings. Popular Roblox Games to Play Online Here are some fan-favorite Roblox games you can enjoy online: 1. Adopt Me! Build and decorate your dream home, adopt pets, and interact with friends in this social simulation game. 2. Brookhaven A sandbox role-playing game where you can explore a town, create scenarios, and interact with other players. 3. Tower of Hell Challenge yourself in this fast-paced obstacle course game that tests your agility and timing. 4. Murder Mystery 2 Play as a detective, murderer, or innocent bystander in this thrilling social deduction game. 5. Arsenal A competitive first-person shooter with exciting gameplay and various modes. Who Should Play Roblox Online? Playing Roblox online is ideal for: Low-Spec Device Users : If your device struggles with downloads, playing online ensures smooth performance. Students on School Devices : Access Roblox on Chromebooks or other restricted systems via browser-based platforms. Gamers on the Go : Enjoy Roblox from anywhere, without needing dedicated software. Alternatives to Playing Roblox Online If you prefer traditional methods, here are other ways to play Roblox: 1. Desktop App Download Roblox Player for Windows or Mac for a dedicated experience. 2. Mobile App Access Roblox via its official app on iOS and Android devices. 3. Console Play Roblox on Xbox for an immersive gaming experience. Conclusion Playing Roblox online has never been easier, thanks to platforms like Now.gg and the official Roblox web app. Whether you want to skip downloads, play on a low-spec device, or enjoy quick access to your favorite games, these options provide a seamless solution. Dive into Roblox today and explore endless worlds, create your own games, and connect with a global community—all from the comfort of your browser. 뉴스제목: Ethereum ($ETH), Solana ($SOL) Binance Coin ($BNB) about to bounce big?
본문: Bitcoin ($BTC) suffered a huge price reversal on Monday and is now beginning its comeback. Altcoins generally went even further into the red, and now the big three of Ethereum ($ETH), Solana ($SOL), and Binance Coin ($BNB) are about to stage their own recoveries. How far up can they go? $ETH retests huge triangle breakout Source: TradingView For the $ETH price on the weekly time frame, things are looking very good indeed. Monday’s price reversal just had the effect of forcing $ETH back for a retest of the huge triangle. This being successful, the coast would be clear for the $ETH bulls to free the price from this triangle and set off towards the all-time high. If the all-time high at $4,878 can be achieved, the next target is the 1.618 Fibonacci at $5,310. $SOL confirms bottom of channel Source: TradingView The 4-hour chart for $SOL shows that the price has been traversing within a descending channel. The worst point in Monday’s reversal coincided perfectly with the bottom trendline of the channel, from which the price has started its bounce. If the $SOL bulls can push the price back to the top of the channel, a breakout from this would give a measured move to around $270, depending on how long the price takes to get back to the top, and where it potentially breaks out. $SOL bull flag and retest of major horizontal support Source: TradingView On the weekly chart for $SOL, things are looking great. The Monday candle wick down has retested what is now hugely strong support at $202. Also, it can be seen that the channel is in fact a bull flag. Having just tested the bottom trendline of this bull flag, it would be likely that the price does get back to the top and break out from there. The measured move for this would be to around $340. $BNB breaks out and confirms above huge ascending triangle Source: TradingView Another wonderful chart is that of $BNB. The weekly chart shows how the price has respected the ascending trendline since all the way back to the beginning of 2018. Also, since 2021, the price has started to traverse inside a big ascending triangle, which broke out last week, and has retested this week. Fibonacci targets overhead are at $1,000, $1,500, $2,000, and $2,500. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

뉴스제목: MuleHunter.ai: Revolutionizing Financial Fraud Detection with AI
본문: MuleHunter.ai is an innovative platform designed to combat financial fraud by identifying and monitoring mule accounts. Leveraging the power of artificial intelligence (AI) and advanced analytics, MuleHunter.ai offers a state-of-the-art solution for organizations seeking to protect their financial ecosystems from fraudulent activities. With increasing cases of fraud in the digital age, tools like MuleHunter.ai are essential for ensuring secure and compliant financial transactions. What is MuleHunter.ai? MuleHunter.ai is a specialized AI-driven tool designed to detect, analyze, and prevent the use of mule accounts in financial transactions. These accounts, often used for money laundering and fraud, pose significant risks to organizations and financial institutions. Key Features : AI-Powered Detection : Identifies suspicious transaction patterns associated with mule accounts. Real-Time Monitoring : Provides continuous oversight to catch fraudulent activities as they occur. Customizable Risk Models : Allows organizations to tailor detection parameters to their unique needs. Actionable Insights : Delivers detailed reports and analytics for swift decision-making. How MuleHunter.ai Works MuleHunter.ai uses a combination of machine learning algorithms, behavioral analytics, and risk scoring to identify fraudulent activity. Step-by-Step Process : Data Ingestion : Collects transaction data from multiple sources, including banks, payment processors, and online platforms. Pattern Analysis : Identifies unusual activity, such as rapid fund transfers or multiple accounts linked to a single identity. Risk Scoring : Assigns a risk score to flagged accounts based on predefined parameters. Alerts and Reporting : Sends real-time alerts for high-risk accounts and provides detailed reports for further investigation. Why MuleHunter.ai is Essential The rise of digital transactions has also led to an increase in fraud. MuleHunter.ai addresses this challenge by offering: 1. Enhanced Security Detects mule accounts and prevents their use in illegal activities such as money laundering, scams, and cybercrime. 2. Regulatory Compliance Helps organizations meet compliance requirements by providing tools for thorough due diligence and fraud prevention. 3. Cost Efficiency Reduces financial losses caused by fraud, saving organizations from potential penalties and reputational damage. 4. Scalable Solutions Whether you’re a small business or a large financial institution, MuleHunter.ai scales to meet your needs. Applications of MuleHunter.ai MuleHunter.ai is versatile and applicable across various industries: 1. Banking and Finance Detects fraudulent accounts and transactions. Ensures compliance with anti-money laundering (AML) regulations. 2. E-Commerce Monitors payment gateways for suspicious activities. Protects against fraudulent refunds or chargebacks. 3. 뉴스제목: MicroStrategy Acquires 21,550 BTC in December, Cementing Its Position as the Largest Corporate Bitcoin Holder
본문: MicroStrategy Acquires 21,550 BTC in Early December MicroStrategy, the largest corporate holder of Bitcoin, has once again made headlines with a significant purchase of 21,550 BTC between December 2 and December 8. This development was reported by Tree News on X, citing Bloomberg. This strategic acquisition reaffirms MicroStrategy’s commitment to its aggressive Bitcoin accumulation strategy and underscores its bullish stance on cryptocurrency as a long-term investment. A Strategic Move Amid Market Fluctuations The purchase adds to MicroStrategy’s already substantial Bitcoin reserves, solidifying its dominance as the top corporate investor in the cryptocurrency sector. This move comes at a time when Bitcoin prices are fluctuating amid broader market uncertainty, reflecting the company’s unwavering confidence in the asset’s future potential. Why this matters: MicroStrategy’s acquisitions signal institutional confidence in Bitcoin. The company’s strategy could inspire other corporate entities to consider similar moves. MicroStrategy: A Bitcoin Trailblazer MicroStrategy, led by executive chairman Michael Saylor, has been a vocal advocate for Bitcoin. The company began its Bitcoin acquisition journey in 2020, citing the cryptocurrency as a hedge against inflation and a superior store of value compared to traditional assets like cash and gold. Key Highlights of MicroStrategy’s Bitcoin Holdings : As of this acquisition, the company’s total Bitcoin holdings exceed 180,000 BTC. Its strategy involves purchasing Bitcoin using a combination of cash reserves and debt offerings. MicroStrategy’s Bitcoin holdings are valued at billions of dollars, making it a bellwether for corporate adoption of cryptocurrency. The Impact on Bitcoin Markets Large-scale purchases like MicroStrategy’s often have ripple effects on the cryptocurrency market: Price Stability : Significant acquisitions can temporarily stabilize or increase Bitcoin prices. Institutional Legitimacy : High-profile investments bolster Bitcoin’s image as a credible asset class. Market Confidence : Such moves may inspire confidence among retail and institutional investors alike. MicroStrategy’s Investment Strategy MicroStrategy’s Bitcoin strategy is not merely opportunistic; it reflects a broader belief in the asset’s transformative potential. The company has consistently articulated its view of Bitcoin as digital gold and a means of preserving wealth over the long term. Key elements of MicroStrategy’s strategy : Accumulating Bitcoin during market dips. Employing debt financing to leverage its purchasing power. Advocating for regulatory clarity to foster broader adoption. Corporate Adoption of Bitcoin: A Growing Trend MicroStrategy’s aggressive Bitcoin acquisitions have set a precedent for other corporations. While few companies have embraced Bitcoin as extensively, interest is growing among institutional investors seeking diversification and inflation hedges. Notable Corporate Bitcoin Holders : Tesla : Holds a significant Bitcoin reserve as part of its investment strategy. Square (Block) : Allocated funds to Bitcoin as part of its balance sheet diversification. Marathon Digital Holdings : A mining company with substantial Bitcoin reserves. Regulatory Considerations for Institutional Investors The rise in corporate Bitcoin acquisitions comes amid increased regulatory scrutiny. Companies like MicroStrategy must navigate evolving policies to ensure compliance while pursuing their crypto strategies. Regulatory challenges include : Tax implications for cryptocurrency holdings. Reporting requirements for publicly traded companies. Navigating jurisdictional differences in crypto regulations. Conclusion MicroStrategy’s acquisition of 21,550 BTC in early December highlights its unwavering commitment to Bitcoin as a cornerstone of its corporate strategy. As the largest corporate Bitcoin holder, MicroStrategy not only influences the cryptocurrency market but also sets an example for other companies considering the integration of digital assets into their portfolios. 뉴스제목: Former Binance CEO CZ Predicts Bitcoin’s Price Will Skyrocket
본문: The cryptocurrency world was abuzz on December 9, 2024, when Changpeng Zhao (CZ) , former CEO of Binance, made a bold declaration about Bitcoin. Speaking through a report shared by Bitcoin Magazine on X (formerly Twitter), CZ expressed his belief that Bitcoin’s price is set to “go to the moon.” This statement has reignited optimism in the market, sparking debates among investors and analysts alike about Bitcoin’s trajectory in the months and years ahead. As one of the most influential figures in the crypto industry, CZ’s predictions carry weight, particularly given his unparalleled experience in the blockchain and digital asset ecosystem. This article explores his statement, the factors influencing Bitcoin’s future, and why CZ’s perspective resonates so strongly with the crypto community. Changpeng Zhao: A Visionary Leader in Cryptocurrency Changpeng Zhao, better known as CZ, has become synonymous with cryptocurrency innovation. As the founder and former CEO of Binance, CZ has played a pivotal role in shaping the global crypto landscape. Binance, under his leadership, grew to become the largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, offering a vast range of services to millions of users worldwide. Key Milestones in CZ’s Career : Founded Binance in 2017 : Propelled by a successful initial coin offering (ICO), Binance quickly rose to prominence. Advocated for Adoption : CZ has been a vocal proponent of digital asset adoption, emphasizing their role in democratizing financial systems. Navigated Regulatory Hurdles : During his tenure, CZ steered Binance through intense regulatory scrutiny, adapting the platform to ensure compliance in key markets. His insights and strategic decisions have cemented his reputation as a thought leader in the blockchain space, making his recent prediction about Bitcoin particularly noteworthy. The Context Behind CZ’s Bitcoin Prediction CZ’s declaration that Bitcoin is “going to the moon” reflects his long-term confidence in the cryptocurrency’s potential. While Bitcoin has experienced its fair share of volatility, the underlying factors driving its value remain robust. Why CZ’s Confidence Matters : Market Authority : As a former leader of Binance, CZ has unparalleled access to market data and trends. Strategic Perspective : His ability to forecast and navigate shifts in the crypto space lends credibility to his predictions. Community Influence : With millions of followers and a global platform, CZ’s statements often shape market sentiment. Bitcoin’s Resilience Amid Market Challenges Bitcoin has consistently proven itself as a resilient asset, weathering market downturns and emerging stronger with each cycle. CZ’s bullish outlook aligns with Bitcoin’s historical trends of recovery and growth following periods of consolidation. Key Drivers of Bitcoin’s Growth : Scarcity : With a capped supply of 21 million coins, Bitcoin is inherently deflationary, driving long-term demand. Institutional Adoption : Companies like MicroStrategy, Tesla, and Square have embraced Bitcoin, signaling growing confidence in its value proposition. Global Acceptance : Bitcoin’s recognition as legal tender in countries like El Salvador highlights its increasing legitimacy. CZ’s Track Record of Market Predictions This is not the first time CZ has made headlines with bold predictions. Throughout his career, he has consistently demonstrated an ability to anticipate major market trends. Notable Predictions That Came True : The Rise of DeFi : In 2020, CZ predicted the rapid growth of decentralized finance (DeFi), which soon became one of the most transformative movements in the crypto sector. Regulatory Scrutiny : He foresaw increased government interest in regulating cryptocurrencies, prompting Binance to enhance its compliance efforts globally. Bitcoin’s 2021 Bull Run : CZ was among the first to suggest Bitcoin could surpass $60,000 during the market’s record-breaking rally. Given this track record, his latest prediction has further strengthened market confidence in Bitcoin’s future. The Current State of the Bitcoin Market As of December 2024, Bitcoin operates in a dynamic environment influenced by macroeconomic factors, regulatory developments, and technological advancements. Despite occasional pullbacks, Bitcoin’s long-term trajectory remains overwhelmingly positive. Market Highlights : Rising Hash Rate : The computational power securing Bitcoin’s network is at an all-time high, reflecting robust miner activity. Increasing User Adoption : From remittances to retail payments, Bitcoin’s use cases are expanding. Lightning Network Growth : This layer-2 solution is making Bitcoin transactions faster and more cost-effective, boosting its utility as a medium of exchange. Potential Challenges Facing Bitcoin While CZ’s prediction underscores optimism, Bitcoin’s journey is not without obstacles. It is essential to consider the potential risks and challenges that could impact its price trajectory. Key Challenges : Regulatory Pressures : Governments worldwide are introducing stricter regulations, which could dampen innovation and adoption. Market Volatility : As a relatively young asset class, Bitcoin is prone to significant price fluctuations. Technological Competition : Emerging blockchain projects with unique features could divert attention and investment away from Bitcoin. Despite these challenges, Bitcoin’s strong fundamentals and first-mover advantage position it well to maintain its dominance in the market. Community and Investor Reactions CZ’s optimistic statement has sparked lively discussions across social media platforms. From veteran investors to new market entrants, the crypto community has rallied behind his vision. What the Community Is Saying : Supporters : Many investors echo CZ’s sentiment, citing Bitcoin’s scarcity and increasing adoption as compelling reasons for its eventual price surge. Skeptics : Some analysts caution against relying solely on optimistic predictions, emphasizing the need for diversification and risk management. Regardless of differing opinions, CZ’s statement has undoubtedly reignited enthusiasm within the market. Why CZ’s Prediction Matters CZ’s bold proclamation comes at a critical time for Bitcoin, serving as a reminder of its transformative potential. His confidence reinforces the idea that Bitcoin is not just a speculative asset but a revolutionary technology capable of reshaping global finance. The Bigger Picture : Institutional Influence : Statements from influential leaders like CZ often pave the way for increased institutional participation. Long-Term Vision : CZ’s focus on Bitcoin’s future aligns with the broader movement toward decentralized financial systems. Conclusion Changpeng Zhao’s prediction that Bitcoin is set to “go to the moon” reflects a deep belief in the cryptocurrency’s enduring potential. As a pioneer in the blockchain space, CZ’s perspective carries significant weight, offering a sense of direction to both seasoned investors and newcomers to the market. While challenges remain, Bitcoin’s robust fundamentals, growing adoption, and technological advancements continue to position it as a leading asset in the global economy. CZ’s bold statement serves as a rallying cry, encouraging the crypto community to stay the course and believe in the transformative power of Bitcoin. 뉴스제목: Russian Lawmaker Proposes Strategic Bitcoin Reserve: Report
본문: Anton Tkachev, a State Duma deputy from the New People Party, has formally proposed establishing a strategic Bitcoin reserve in Russia. Tkachev sent an appeal to Russian Finance Minister Anton Siluanov urging an assessment of the feasibility of creating such a reserve. Arguments in Support of the Initiative The document, cited by local media, highlights Bitcoin’s potential as an alternative to traditional currency reserves. In the appeal, Tkachev addressed the finance minister, writing: “I ask you, dear Anton Germanovich, to assess the feasibility of creating a strategic Bitcoin reserve in Russia by analogy with state reserves in traditional currencies. If this initiative is approved, I ask you to submit it to the government of the Russian Federation for further implementation.” His proposal outlines the challenges of reliance on traditional currencies susceptible to volatility, sanctions, and inflation. Tkachev explained that these vulnerabilities threaten Russia’s financial stability. He noted the need for innovative financial instruments, including alternative reserve assets independent of any single nation, to address modern geopolitical challenges. The report also emphasized the rising significance of cryptocurrencies in global trade. The official noted that they have become a critical tool for nations facing sanctions and limited access to traditional payment systems. He also highlighted the Central Bank of Russia’s ongoing efforts to trial cross-border crypto payments. Additionally, Tkachev pointed out Bitcoin’s performance, citing its rise to $100,000 in December 2024 as evidence of its potential as a store of value and a source of significant profits for state reserves. Putin Shows Public Support For Bitcoin The proposition follows comments by Russian President Vladimir Putin, who supported Bitcoin during the Investment Forum in Moscow on December 4. Putin described the cryptocurrency as an “unstoppable technology” and endorsed its potential as a global reserve asset. The president criticized the U.S. for leveraging the dollar’s dominance to enforce political agendas. He cited Western nations’ freezing of $300 billion in Russian reserves after the 2022 Ukraine war as a key factor driving countries to explore alternatives like Bitcoin. Emphasizing the resilience of digital currencies, Putin stated that no one can ban Bitcoin or other electronic payment systems, predicting their continued development as nations seek lower costs and improved reliability. This development aligns with a growing global trend of governments considering Bitcoin as a reserve asset. In the United States, recent months have seen increased interest in Bitcoin reserves following Donald Trump’s election win, with several states initiating related legislation. Vancouver Mayor Ken Sim recently announced plans to incorporate Bitcoin into the city’s investment portfolio, aiming to establish it as a crypto-friendly hub. Other international leaders, including Venezuelan opposition figure María Corina Machado and Polish presidential candidate Sławomir Mentzen, have also championed the idea of Bitcoin reserves for their respective nations. The post Russian Lawmaker Proposes Strategic Bitcoin Reserve: Report appeared first on CryptoPotato .

뉴스제목: Floki Releases No-Fee Crypto Debit Card, Boosting Token Fundamentals
본문: Memecoin project Floki (FLOKI) released a zero-fee debit card in 31 European countries on Monday, with plans to expand the offering to other countries in the future.  The debit card allows users to spend bitcoin (BTC), ether (ETH), USD Coin (USDC), tether (USDT), BNB Chain’s BNB and FLOKI globally at merchants that accept VISA or Mastercard. There are zero transaction and exchange rate fees, and it is compatible with over eight blockchain networks.  A physical card costs $33, while a virtual card costs just over $10. A 2% top-up fee applies when transferring tokens to the spending account associated with the card.  “FLOKI holders can now directly off-ramp their tokens through a debit card that can be used with millions of merchants without having to worry about going through hassles to be able to spend their funds,” Floki lead developer B told CoinDesk in a Telegram message. “We will also introduce a VIP card that will allow users to have card limits of up to 50K per day and 250K per month.”  B added that the cards will not be available in OFAC-sanctioned regions or where restricted by banks.  Physical and virtual cards are currently available in Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovenia, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.

뉴스제목: Crypto Market Grows 45% in November, Surpassing $3.3 Trillion
본문: The global cryptocurrency market experienced a 45% surge in November 2024 , reaching an impressive total market capitalization of $3.3 trillion , according to JPMorgan. This remarkable growth was largely driven by President-elect Donald Trump’s reelection, as reported by CoinDesk , which rejuvenated investor confidence and spurred a rally across digital assets. The resurgence in the crypto market also saw trading volumes more than double, while Bitcoin ETPs (exchange-traded products) recorded $7.6 billion in net sales . Additionally, mining profitability improved as Bitcoin’s price rally outpaced hashrate growth, creating a favorable environment for miners. A Political Catalyst: Trump’s Reelection Sparks Market Optimism President-elect Donald Trump’s victory in the 2024 U.S. presidential election played a pivotal role in the cryptocurrency market’s explosive growth last month. Trump’s administration has historically had a mixed stance on digital assets, but his reelection has been perceived as a signal for reduced regulatory pressure and a more pro-business environment, which has rekindled interest in crypto investments. Why Trump’s Reelection Matters to Crypto : Market Confidence : Political stability often correlates with investor confidence, encouraging risk-on behavior in alternative asset classes. Regulatory Outlook : The expectation of a business-friendly approach under Trump has led to speculation that crypto regulations may be softened or streamlined. Institutional Participation : Clearer regulatory policies could pave the way for more institutional capital to flow into the crypto market. Bitcoin Leads the Charge Bitcoin, the leading cryptocurrency, was at the forefront of this market surge. Its price rally significantly contributed to the broader market’s growth, with Bitcoin ETPs witnessing $7.6 billion in net sales , reflecting heightened interest from institutional and retail investors alike. Key Highlights for Bitcoin in November : Price Rally : Bitcoin’s robust price growth drove market enthusiasm, setting a positive tone for altcoins. Trading Volumes : More than doubled, signaling heightened investor activity across exchanges. Mining Profitability : Improved as the price rally outpaced the growth in network hashrate, creating favorable conditions for miners. Crypto Market Cap Hits $3.3 Trillion The 45% increase in the crypto market cap represents one of the most significant monthly growth periods in 2024, bringing the total to $3.3 trillion. This milestone underscores the sector’s resilience and its ability to rebound from regulatory challenges and market downturns. What’s Behind the Growth? Institutional Inflows : Major players like asset management firms and banks increased their exposure to digital assets. Retail Enthusiasm : Renewed optimism among retail investors further boosted demand across leading cryptocurrencies. Global Adoption : Countries exploring CBDCs (central bank digital currencies) and blockchain innovations added to the positive sentiment. Improved Mining Profitability November also brought good news for Bitcoin miners. As Bitcoin’s price surged, mining profitability improved, even as the network’s hashrate continued to climb. This trend highlights the delicate balance between price dynamics and network security. Factors Driving Mining Success : Outpacing Hashrate Growth : Bitcoin’s rally outstripped the growth in computational power, enhancing miner revenue. Energy Efficiency : Advances in mining technology have reduced costs, making operations more profitable. Geopolitical Shifts : With miners relocating to more favorable jurisdictions, operational stability has improved. Altcoins Join the Rally While Bitcoin took center stage, the altcoin market also benefited from November’s bullish sentiment. Ethereum, Solana, and Cardano, among others, recorded significant price increases as investors diversified their portfolios. Top Performers : Ethereum (ETH) : Continued to gain traction due to its use in decentralized applications and its position as the leading smart contract platform. Solana (SOL) : Outpaced many competitors in terms of transaction speed and cost, attracting new projects. Cardano (ADA) : Saw increased adoption in decentralized finance (DeFi) and enterprise applications. The Role of Bitcoin ETPs in Market Growth The impressive $7.6 billion in net sales recorded by Bitcoin ETPs underscores their growing role in bridging the gap between traditional financial markets and cryptocurrencies. These products allow institutional investors to gain exposure to Bitcoin without directly owning the asset, simplifying compliance and risk management. Why Bitcoin ETPs Are Crucial : Ease of Access : Provides a familiar vehicle for traditional investors. Liquidity Boost : Increased activity in ETPs contributes to overall market liquidity. Market Maturity : Signals growing acceptance of crypto as an asset class by mainstream financial institutions. Challenges Ahead for the Crypto Market While the crypto market’s performance in November was remarkable, it’s essential to consider potential risks that could impact its trajectory: Regulatory Uncertainty : Despite Trump’s perceived pro-business stance, regulatory clarity remains a pressing issue. Market Volatility : The crypto market’s historical tendency for sharp corrections could lead to sudden price swings. Global Economic Factors : Rising interest rates or geopolitical tensions could influence investor sentiment. However, the industry’s resilience and innovation continue to position it for long-term growth. The Broader Implications of November’s Growth The 45% growth in November highlights a renewed appetite for digital assets, with implications for the broader financial ecosystem. This milestone suggests that cryptocurrencies are maturing into a significant asset class capable of attracting both retail and institutional capital. What’s Next for Crypto? Increased Adoption : More businesses and individuals are likely to integrate cryptocurrencies into their financial strategies. Technological Advancements : Innovations in blockchain technology will continue to enhance scalability and efficiency. Global Influence : Cryptocurrencies will play a central role in shaping the future of finance, commerce, and governance. Conclusion The cryptocurrency market’s 45% growth in November, reaching a record $3.3 trillion market cap, marks a pivotal moment in 2024. Bolstered by President-elect Trump’s reelection, rising trading volumes, and improved mining profitability, the crypto sector is entering a new phase of growth and adoption. While challenges like regulatory uncertainty and market volatility remain, the long-term outlook for digital assets is overwhelmingly positive. As institutional interest grows and technological advancements continue, the cryptocurrency market is well-positioned to reshape global finance in the years to come. To learn more about the innovative startups shaping the future of the crypto industry, explore our article on the latest news , where we delve into the most promising ventures and their potential to disrupt traditional industries.
